reviews.review_msg: I took hum340 humanities and philosophy and dropped it after 2 clasaes cus it was too hard for me... But he seems really really friendly and he is open to different opinions and really listens and tries to understand each students opinions

This prof is officially my second fav prof at SFU. He was incredibly funny, clear in what he wanted and was very nice! The way he taught the class was very helpful and informative; you have to attend and pay attention (in regards to person below me)but put in the effort and he will recognize your effort. Favourite class so far. Loved it.

We only covered half of what he set out to do in lectures. He stated that he wanted to avoid 'lecturing' about the text books at all cost, but it seems he wanted to avoid lecturing the entire 2nd half of the course.
What a waste of time. This man loves to brag about how much he knows and couldn't care less about whether anyone else understands him. Dont take anything with him if you value your G.P.A.

Very passionate about his subjects & feels that you must be too. Shows bias in treatment of students esp to those not as passionate as himself. Extensions not granted- he feels that if you don't hand it in on time that your stress level in writing it will speak for itself. Not very compassionate or understanding. Would never take his class again.
